word:
19. Physical Culture.--"Physical culture is an essential part of all right methods of education. The young need to be taught how to develop their physical powers, how to preserve these powers in the best condition, and how to make them useful in the practical duties of life. Many think that 
                                                                           36
these things are no part of school, work, but this is a mistake."--Sp. Test., p. 32.
